name: A Colorful Mutiny
description:
Summary

"A Colorful Mutiny" is made for Untitled Game Jam #42

It's a simple, short game demonstrating a turn-based fighting mechanic. I made all assets during game jam except for sound effects and music. Since this is my first jam submission (and also the only complete game I've ever made) I didn't have enough time to add more levels or expand on the main mechanics idea. A lot of things should be improved. If you liked the idea, feel free to use or expand it (just let me know please).

I hope you enjoy this game.

How to Play

It's a turn-based fight, in each turn you'll choose 3 words to form a curse. Each word will have a damage and your turn's damage is sum of all 3 words' damages. Choosing words that start with the same letter will give you damage multiplier (it'll multiply turn's damage by 2 or 3 depending on number of words that start with the same letter). See instructions page in game for more details.
